name: Rapid Recipes
body:
### Stay hungry.
We are developing a program that will find you a recipe based on the foods in your pantry, the amount of time you want to spend cooking, and your favorite ethnic cuisines.  We hope you will enjoy.

### Designers
Anisha Nakagawa, Maggie Jakus, and Annabel Consilvio are developing this program.  They attend Olin College of Engineering.

### Project Proposal
Find our project proposal [here](/recipe_program/images/SoftdesProjectProposal.pdf).

### Design Review 1
Find our preparation document [here](/recipe_program/images/PreparationandFraming.pdf) and our reflection document [here](/recipe_program/images/DesignReviewReflection.pdf).
***
